'''1.21.11 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.21.11-pre3''' in the launcher) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.11]], released on November 25, 2025.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-11-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.21.11 Pre-Release 3|November 25, 2025}}</ref>

A separate [[unobfuscated version]] of 1.21.11 Pre-Release 3 was released, titled '''1.21.11 Pre-Release 3 Unobfuscated''' (or '''1.21.11-pre3_unobfuscated''' when in the launcher). This is an experimental version released in preparation for obfuscation being removed from {{JE}} clients and servers.<ref>{{Mcnet|removing-obfuscation-in-java-edition|Removing obfuscation in Java Edition|October 29, 2025}}</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Spear]]'''
* While charging, the spear hit animation and sound now play only after the previous hit animation has fully completed.
* While charging in first person, the spear head now gradually rotates to a fully vertical position over time, matching the behavior in third person.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Horse]]'''
* Tamed horses no longer run into [[cactus]] or [[sweet berry bush]]es.

=== General ===
'''[[Creative mode]]'''
* The [[attack range]] extension for players in Creative mode is set to 4 or 6 blocks in certain cases.

'''[[Graphics]]'''
* The "See-Through Leaves" video setting is now turned off on the "Fast" graphics preset.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.21.11-pre3
|;dev
|302900|Spears' reach overrides the player's entity interaction range.
|303036|Zombie nautiluses with a negative age possess a hitbox the size of a baby nautilus.
|303709|Dumping dynamic textures with large textures makes the game crash.
|304045|Spear hit sounds play the normal hit sounds.
|304362|RGSS breaks permanently when toggling hardware anisotropic filtering.
|304363|Copper golem statues render at the wrong position in shelves when reloading resource packs.
|304407|Charge attacks are impossible when looking at a mob that's between 3 and 4.5 blocks away.
|304440|The mouse cursor changes to the pointing hand shape when hovering over inventory slots in the crafter UI.
|304441|The mouse cursor changes to the pointing hand shape when hovering over the creative inventory scroll bar's bounds even if it's invisible or inactive.
|;prev
|304452|Non-see-through leaves in Programmer Art still look abnormal.
}}</onlyinclude>
